title: unnata yOgigaL
sahitya:
unnata yOgigaL OdiDum mantram Om shuddha shakti Om enum mantram


anupallavi

  tan nigharaTradOr tAraka mantram dharmArtha kAma mOkSa dAyaka mantram


caraNam    bhakti sheyya sheyya phalam mighu mantram parama turiya sukha varamaruL mantram
mutti vazhi tirakkum mUla mahA mantram mukkanal mUTTiDum pakkuva mantram
